attributes.action: Recognise the rights of Turkish Cypriots and treat them with the equality and respect that is befitting, from a Guarantor Power of Cyprus.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 19th January 2009, another nail was hammered into the Turkish Cypriot's coffin, as a UK judicial ruling saw fit to uphold the bias  ruling of the European Court, regarding land and property in North Cyprus.  This ruling will, effectively, lead to many legal claims by Greek Cypriots wishing to seize the assets and properties of many people in Europe and, especially, here in the U.K. Yet again, the EU and our so-called UK Guarantor Power, has shown the world their true colours, by  completely ignoring the human rights of the Turkish Cypriot people. We have been treated in an unequal and unjust manner for far too long and enough is enough!

rejection.details: Judicial rulings are a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
